triples.name: Mobile robot
triples.relevance: Mobile robots are the core subject of the survey, representing autonomous systems that can move and operate in various environments.

triples.name: Autonomous robot
triples.relevance: Autonomous robots are central to the paper's focus on systems that perform complex tasks without continuous human guidance.

triples.name: Artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: AI techniques are fundamental to enabling mobile robots to solve complex problems and make autonomous decisions.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Multi-agent systems provide the theoretical foundation for coordinating multiple mobile robots to work cooperatively.

triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: Motion planning is a core method for determining robot paths and movements while avoiding obstacles.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Automated planning provides the task-level reasoning and action sequencing for accomplishing complex robot objectives.
